TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerActionPropertyItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerActionPropertyItem Inherits DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示与从 派生的类中的属性相关的面板项。

span.span: Represents a panel item that is associated with a property in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的智能标记面板中的各个项。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 每个项都与从派生类中的属性通常关联类，由组件作者提供。Each item is typically associated with a property in a class that is derived from the class and supplied by the component author. 关联时将保持通过中的属性名称存储在属性。The association is maintained through the name of the property, as stored in the property. 关联在一起以形成一个面板，通过调用各个面板项被赋予方法类。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. 若要显示关联属性的值，该属性必须具有`get`访问器方法; 以允许编辑，该属性必须具有`set`访问器方法。To display the value of the associated property, that property must have a `get` accessor method; to allow editing, the property must have a `set` accessor method. 面板允许直接编辑的用户的属性项的方式取决于存在的关联属性的数据类型的支持类型信息。The way in which the panel allows direct editing of a property item by the user depends on the supporting type information present for the data type of the associated property. 下表显示可能的方案。The following table shows the likely scheme. |属性类型信息Property type information|编辑用户界面 (UI) 的属性项Property item editing user interface (UI)| |-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------| |具有关联的类型编辑器 ()Has an associated type editor ()|用于编辑属性的值将显示与基础属性相关联的类型编辑器。The type editor associated with the underlying property is displayed for editing the property's value.| |已为已知类型关联的类型转换器 ()Has an associated type converter to a known type ()|用于编辑属性的值显示的已知类型的类型编辑器。The type editor for the known type is displayed for editing the property's value. 例如，为的类型转换器很可能显示。For example, a type converter to will likely display a .| |布尔值Boolean value|使用二进制 UI，例如复选标记将显示项。The item is displayed using a binary UI, such as a check mark.| |上述任何。None of the above.|使用数据类型的非可编辑的文本字符串形式将显示该项方法。The item is displayed as a non-editable text string using the data type's method.| 所有的基础类型，如，和常见[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据类型，如，提供标准的类型转换器和编辑器。All fundamental types, such as , and common [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] data types, such as , supply standard type converters and editors. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)或[通用类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada). 有关类型编辑器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现 UI 类型编辑器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed961fb9-ee02-4666-b511-05f3204bb75c)。For more information about type editors, see [How to: Implement a UI Type Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed961fb9-ee02-4666-b511-05f3204bb75c). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的集合对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 将智能标记将附加到 Windows 窗体组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，如何`category`参数用于在面板上的项进行分组，请参阅方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. `memberName`参数指的是派生自的程序员提供的类的成员关联属性的名称类。The `memberName` parameter refers to the name of the associated property that is a member of the programmer-supplied class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的集合对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 将智能标记将附加到 Windows 窗体组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 获取与此项关联的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that this item is associated with.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含关联属性的名称。

span.span: A that contains the name of the associated property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定哪个属性-从派生类中类-此项应绑定到。The property specifies which property—in the class derived from the class—the item should be bound to. 当程序员通过用户界面 (UI) 控制面板项与交互时，将设置此关联的属性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 在构造函数中设置。 is set in the constructor. 其值是区分大小写。Its value is case-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ComponentModel.IComponent RelatedComponent { get; set; }
.property instance class System.ComponentModel.IComponent RelatedComponent
Public Property RelatedComponent As IComponent
public: property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ RelatedComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将其项供给当前面板的组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its items to the current panel.

value.span: 供给组件，该组件应具有提供 对象的关联设计器。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，另一个组件可以实现其拉出模型控制面板项到当前的列表。With the property, another component can lend its pull-model panel items to the current list. 例如，用户控件可能聚合从一个或多个其构成控件的对象。For example, a user control might aggregate the objects from one or more of its constituent controls. 此属性与结合工作属性。This property works in conjunction with the property.
